summary.span: 表示图例项中的图例单元。

span.span: Represents a legend cell in a legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用由表示的图例项填充图例。A legend is populated with legend items, which are represented by the . 这些图例项包含单个图例单元格，反过来由。These legend items consist of individual legend cells, which are in turn represented by the .

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the legend cell.

value.span: 用于绘制图例单元背景的 值。

span.span: A value used to draw the legend cell's background.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在图例中设置的任何实体的背景色时具有最高优先级。The property has the highest priority when setting the background color of any entity in the legend.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于绘制图例单元内容的水平单元数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of horizontal cells used to draw the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示用于绘制图例单元内容的水平单元数。

span.span: An value that represents the number of horizontal cells used to draw the legend cell contents.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果单元格内容必须超出范围的单元格宽度，则可以设置属性设置为适合内容所需的单元格的数目。If the cell contents must extend beyond the cell width, you can set the property to the number of cells required to fit the contents. 如果你想要添加的扩展标头或图例的标题，最常使用此属性。This property is most often used if you wish to add an extended header or title to the legend. 当此属性设置为一个值大于 1 时，必须以适应扩展的图例单元格的内容添加空的图例单元格。When this property is set to a value larger than 1, empty legend cells must be added in order to accommodate the contents of the extended legend cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the legend cell type.

value.span: 枚举值，表示用于定义图例单元格内容的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the type that will be used to define the contents of the legend cell.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定将显示在每个单个图例单元格的内容的类型。The property determines the type of content that will be displayed in each individual legend cell. 必须指定以下的单元格类型之一：One of the following cell types must be specified: - Text： 指定一个字符串，使用属性，并将图例单元中显示。Text: A string is specified using the property, and will be displayed in the legend cell. - SeriesSymbol： 序列符号定义由中的属性类。SeriesSymbol: A series symbol is defined by the property in the class. 它将会显示图例单元格。It will be displayed for the legend cell. 请注意，序列符号是可视的指示器，线条、 矩形或标记。Recall that a series symbol is a visual indicator—a line, rectangle or marker. 当设置为，自定义项的所有标记特性都应用于单元格。When is set to , all marker attributes of the custom item apply to the cell. - 图像： 定义图像使用属性将显示在图例单元格。Image: An image is defined using the property and will be displayed in the legend cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the font for the legend cell.

value.span: 获取一个 对象，表示图例单元的字体。

span.span: A object that represents the font for the legend cell.

value.span: 默认值为“Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt”。

span.span: The default value is "Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以用于设置图例单元的字体属性。The property can be used to set font properties of the legend cell. 如果您尝试更改此属性对象在运行时，将出现编译错误。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在运行时设置字体属性，您必须创建一个新对象。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元格的映射区特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the map area attributes of the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 值，表示图例单元格相应映射区的特性。

span.span: A value that represents the attributes of the legend cell's corresponding map area.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您设置属性，将自动创建一个客户端图像映射。If you set the property, a client-side image map will automatically be created. 映射区将还会创建其属性字符串追加到\<映射 > 对应于相关的图例单元的标记。A map area will also be created, with its attribute string appended to the \ tag that corresponds to the relevant legend cell. 属性可以结合使用属性来指定映射区特性，例如，目标 = _blank，以及客户端事件处理程序，例如，OnClick="MyEvent()"。The property can be used in conjunction with the property to specify map area attributes, for example, target= _blank, as well as client-side event handlers, for example, OnClick="MyEvent()". 设置此属性将没有任何效果，如果属性设置为`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. 如果属性设置为一系列和该序列的数据点，则数据点属性具有的优先级。If the property is set for both a series and a data point of that series, the data point property has precedence. 设置此属性时，可以使用特殊关键字和每个关键字将替换为某种类型的适用图表元素中的数据。Special keywords may be used when setting this property, and each keyword will be replaced with some type of data from the applicable chart element.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的边距。

span.span: Gets or sets the margins of the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示图例单元格边距的顶部、底部、左侧和右侧值。

span.span: A object that represents the top, bottom, left, and right values of the legend cell margins.

value.span: 顶部、底部、左侧和右侧的默认值为“0,0,15,15”。

span.span: The default values for top, bottom, left and right are "0,0,15,15".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 边距以图例单元的字体大小的百分比来度量。Margins are measured as a percentage of the font size for the legend cell.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip text for the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例单元的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend cell.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将没有任何效果，如果属性设置为`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**若要以这种方式，创建图像映射的属性对象必须设置为。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可以使用二进制流时创建图像映射，但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 如果`ToolTip`属性设置为图例项和图例单元格，则图例单元格属性具有的优先级。If the `ToolTip` property is set for both a legend item and a legend cell, the legend cell property has precedence. 这属性可以设置特殊关键字，以显示不同类型的与图表相关的数据。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要创建具有用户定义的坐标的图像映射，请使用根的属性对象。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元格的 URL 目标。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL target of the legend cell.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图表元素的目标 URL 或定位点。

span.span: A value that represents the destination URL or anchor point of the chart element.

value.span: 若要使用绝对 URL，请以“http://”或“www.”开始字符串表达式。

span.span: To use an absolute URL, start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.".

value.span: 如果字符串不是以上述前缀之一开始，则将该字符串视为一个相对 URL。

span.span: If the string does not start with either of these prefixes it will be treated as a relative URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置此属性，将自动创建一个客户端图像映射。If you set this property, a client-side image map will be automatically created. 映射区还将创建其 Href 特性设置为指定的定位点或 URL。A map area will also be created with its Href attribute set to the specified anchor or URL. 设置此属性将没有任何效果，如果属性设置为`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. 属性的映射区域，例如，目标 = _blank，可以通过使用指定属性。Attributes of the map area(s), for example, target=_blank, can be specified by using the property. 属性可以设置特殊关键字，以显示不同类型的与图表相关的数据。The property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关键字](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c)。For more information, see [Keywords](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c). 若要创建具有用户定义的坐标的图像映射，请使用根的属性对象。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object. 有关详细信息，请参阅[图表图像呈现](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505)。For more information, see [Chart Image Rendering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/82ff568d-838c-408b-bd85-62e424ae0505).
